statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Network flow is a well-known difficult problem for ACMers. Given a graph, your task is to find out the maximum flow for the weighted directed graph.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of input contains an integer T, denoting the number of test cases.
For each test case, the first line contains two integers N and M, denoting the number of vertexes and edges in the graph. (2 <= N <= 15, 0 <= M <= 1000)
Next M lines, each line contains three integers X, Y and C, there is an edge from X to Y and the capacity of it is C. (1 <= X, Y <= N, 1 <= C <= 1000)

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test cases, you should output the maximum flow from source 1 to sink N.
